bodydiv.p: An entity shall not adjust the contractual service margin for a group of insurance contracts without direct participation features for the following changes in fulfilment cash flows because they do not relate to future service:

li.p: the effect of the time value of money and changes in the time value of money and the effect of financial risk and changes in financial risk. These effects comprise:
the effect, if any, on estimated future cash flows;
the effect, if disaggregated, on the risk adjustment for non-financial risk; and
the effect of a change in discount rate.
changes in estimates of fulfilment cash flows in the liability for incurred claims.
experience adjustments, except those described in paragraph B96(a).
